message: This is the first product, and it's a low-quality one. I'm offering it to you for $100. Please let me know if you're interested in buying it.
Thank you for letting me know the quality of the product. While I appreciate the offer, I'm going to pass on this one.

I understand you passed on the first one. I'll let you know that this second product is also low-quality. I'm still offering it to you for $100. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to throw in a 10% discount if you buy it now. The price would be $90.
Thank you for the offer, but I'm still going to pass on this one. I appreciate the discount, but the risk of it being low quality isn't worth it to me.

I'm glad I could offer you a chance to see the difference. This product is high-quality, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it. I'm still offering it to you for $100. I want to assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and meets the highest standards. If you're willing to take a chance, I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Okay, I'm willing to take a chance on this one.  I'll buy it for $100.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! I want to assure you that I'm not trying to sell you a lemon. However, I do want to be upfront with you that this next product is also low-quality. I'm offering it to you for $100, but I'll give you a 20% discount if you buy it now. The price would be $80. I think this is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a good price, and I'm willing to make a strong case for why this product is worth the investment.

It's a low-quality product, and I think it's better for me to just give it away rather than try to sell it to you for $100.

Thank you for the generous offer, Alice. While I appreciate the free product, I'm still hesitant to purchase low-quality items, even for free. I'm looking for products that provide value and are worth the cost. I'll continue to pass until I find a high-quality item.

I completely understand your perspective, Bob. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to deceive you or take advantage of you.
